name: AceHero
description:
A fun retro Shoot'em Up. Bring your enemies down and be a hero!

AceHero is a Shoot'em Up heavily inspired on retro games like Sonic Wings (AeroFighters) and other titles from this genre.

It was entirely made with pre-made licensed assets, with the exception of programming and desing which were made by me. I hope you enjoy this short prototype, you can comment on the page or contact me if you want to share your opinion!
